nodes.text: The Airam Clans were the ruling clans of the Airam sector. The Airam was a clan-based culture considered fiercely independent. Known clan leaders were Tamaron and Ilay. The Airam Clans forces later joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic and were reorganized as the Airam Sector Force. The Clans were known to be able to support respectable fleets and armies from its own resources.
